name: Asteria (itch) (Corentin PB)
description:
First person contemplative puzzle game made during the GGJ 2021 in 48 hours. The theme of the jam was "Lost & Found". We added the diversifier "Starlight : Your game world is inspired by stars and constellations".

This was a first for some members of the team but It went great and we find the result quite good. This version of the game is a bit different from the one we send during the jam, we made some adjustments on the menus, sensibility and other small tweaks and improvements.

Link to the GGJ game page : Asteria

Link to the github repository : Asteria

Controls :

  • Escape : Pause the game
  • Ctrl : Show the constellations to find
  • ZQSD : Move the character
  • Space : Jump
  • Right Clic : Zoom

This game was made by:

  • KALITA Milo (3D artist)
  • LOURTIES Thomas (Game / Level Designer)
